channel.title: networking on Gergő Vári's blog
channel.description: Recent content in networking on Gergő Vári's blog

item.title: How to make sure you'll NOT get invited anywhere twice.
item.description: Imagine I go to your beatiful place and I break a few windows that you just installed. Have you ever wished for someone to just turn on an annoying hair dryer for hours on your electricity bill? If yes, you’re fucking insane. Hit me up and I’ll make sure you’ll meet… …my 2 fellows, who call themselves a certain, very liked ethnicity in Europe. Let’s not mention the fact that they’re more white than me.
item.content:encoded:
Imagine I go to your beatiful place and I break a few windows that you just installed.

Have you ever wished for someone to just turn on an annoying hair dryer for hours on your electricity bill?

If yes, you’re fucking insane. Hit me up and I’ll make sure you’ll meet…

…my 2 fellows, who call themselves a certain, very liked ethnicity in Europe.

Let’s not mention the fact that they’re more white than me.

They wanted to show off their “light-skin rizz” in the best light possible…

How do you even lose a FUCKING BIG VACUUM CLEANER?

The host was very happy.

We weren’t invited there so far.

I don’t want to lie, I had a little laugh.

Very little.

Moral of the story, don’t bring monkeys if you want to network.

I’m sure it’s not a bad idea on a teenage party though.
